DataElement.preferredName: Vital Signs Systolic Blood Pressure Data Source Data Value Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes.:The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field. It may represent a numeric quantity, a textual characterization, a date or time measurement, or some other state, depending on the nature of the attribute.:The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart._The words of something written.
